properties.areaDesc: East Valley; Fountain Hills/East Mesa; Southeast Valley/Queen Creek; Scottsdale/Paradise Valley
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 10 at 6:11PM MST by NWS Phoenix AZ
properties.description:
At 610 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over
Freestone Park, or over Gilbert, moving north at 25 mph.

Dime size hail and winds in excess of 40 mph will be possible with
this storm.

Locations impacted include...
Mesa, Gilbert, Fountain Hills, East Mesa, Freestone Park, Granite
Reef Dam, Gilbert City Hall, Falcon Field Airport and Superstition
Springs Mall.

This includes the following highways...
US Highway 60 between mile markers 182 and 190.
AZ Route 87 between mile markers 182 and 191.
AZ Route 202 between mile markers 16 and 26, and between mile markers
36 and 40.
properties.instruction:
This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio
stations and available television stations for additional information
and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

NWSheadline: SIGNIFICANT WEATHER ADVISORY FOR MARICOPA COUNTY UNTIL 645 PM MST
